column2: The camera teleports with the player when they perform short-range teleports, instead of moving quickly to the new location.
Dispel the protective shield surrounding an enemy game piece.
Gather relief supplies for the refugees before time runs out!
Find the sensors in the third location.
You have the Gift of True Sight.

Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.
This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>This elegant scepter was the most desired weapon amongst mesmers of the past.</c>
<c=@abilitytype>Dual Attack.</c> Create an area that cripples and damages enemies.
This PvP League badge is available with a silver effective rating.

Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.
This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>This was said to be one of the most sought-after weapons in the Echovald Forest.</c>
You failed to complete the race.
You're earning points with the castaways.
You must drop your defuse kit to interact with this object.

You were an enormous help to us, and I'd be remiss if I didn't let you know. Thank you for your assistance with our observation devices and the Destroyers. Your work correlates with our survival. What with constant tremors, and flaming rubble falling from the sky, your endeavor has made our time on this flaming death rock a bit more tolerable. I'll be sure to mention you in my dissertation.

—Research Assistant Ulaa
<c=@abilitytype>Dual Attack.</c> Launch a hurricane in a direction, healing allies and damaging enemies.
You took silver place in this race!

Dear fan,

As a supporter or participant in the events at Vehtendi Arena—Elona's most spectacular sports venue—please accept this message as recognition of your contribution to the games. Praise Joko!

—MC Turgut
Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Hypothesis.
You have received extra map-bonus reward points.
Help Aksim care for and train raptors.

I can't fathom how you were able to take out those mursaat defenses. You seem to be somewhat above average in competence, which is more than I can say for my krewe. If it wasn't for you, I'd probably be charred asura. I plan on pushing for a promotion for my feats through this fortress when I get back. And don't worry, I'll try to include you in my tales.

—Explorer Rakk
You already possess a special action skill.
